Title: Requires licensed day care facilities to contact a child's parent or guardian if they are absent from day care without providing prior notice
Summary: Requires licensed day care facilities to contact a child's parent or guardian if they are absent from day care, with no prior notice given, within thirty minutes after such child is recorded as absent.
LawCode: Add ยง390-aa, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring licensed day care facilities to contact a child's parent or guardian if they are absent
